name: Crystal Shard
base_effect: Conjure dark crystals to bombard an enemy, dealing Magic Damage and stunning them for 2 seconds.

name: Crystal Blast
base_effect: Conjure dark crystals to bombard an enemy, dealing Magic Damage, stunning them for 2 seconds, and dealing additional Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

name: Crystal Fragments
base_effect: Conjure dark crystals to bombard an enemy, dealing Magic Damage and stunning them for 2 seconds. Casting other Magicka abilities has a 33% chance to cause your next Crystal Fragments to deal 50% more damage, cost 50% less Magicka, and become instant cast.

name: Encase
base_effect: Call forth Daedric shards from the earth to immobilize enemies in front of you for 4 seconds.

name: Shattering Prison
base_effect: Call forth Daedric shards from the earth to immobilize enemies in front of you for 4 seconds. When the effect ends, the shards shatter, dealing Magic Damage to all affected enemies.
rank_progression: Duration and damage increase per rank

name: Restraining Prison
base_effect: Call forth Daedric shards from the earth to immobilize enemies in front of you for 5 seconds. Affected enemies have their Movement Speed reduced by 40% for 4 seconds after the immobilization ends.

name: Rune Prison
base_effect: Imprison an enemy in a constricting sphere of dark magic for 3 seconds. Dealing damage to the imprisoned enemy removes the effect.

name: Rune Cage
base_effect: Imprison an enemy in a constricting sphere of dark magic for 3 seconds. Dealing damage to the imprisoned enemy removes the effect. When the effect ends, the rune explodes, dealing Magic Damage to the target.
rank_progression: Duration and damage increase per rank

name: Defensive Rune
base_effect: Etch a rune on yourself that traps the next enemy to attack you in a constricting sphere of dark magic for 3 seconds. The rune lasts for 22 seconds. Dealing damage to the imprisoned enemy removes the effect.

name: Dark Exchange
base_effect: Channel the power of darkness to sacrifice Stamina and restore Magicka and Health over 3 seconds. Each tick restores Magicka and Health.

name: Dark Deal
base_effect: Channel the power of darkness to sacrifice Magicka and restore Stamina and Health over 3 seconds. Each tick restores Stamina and Health.

name: Dark Conversion
base_effect: Channel the power of darkness to sacrifice Stamina and restore Magicka and Health over 3 seconds. Each tick restores Magicka and Health. Also grants Minor Prophecy, increasing Spell Critical by 1314 for 10 seconds.

name: Daedric Mines
base_effect: Summon 3 volatile Daedric mines around you for 30 seconds. Mines take 3 seconds to arm and trigger when an enemy comes close, dealing Magic Damage and immobilizing them for 2 seconds.

name: Daedric Minefield
base_effect: Summon 5 volatile Daedric mines around you for 30 seconds. Mines take 3 seconds to arm and trigger when an enemy comes close, dealing Magic Damage and immobilizing them for 2 seconds.

name: Daedric Tomb
base_effect: Summon 3 volatile Daedric mines at the target location for 30 seconds. Mines take 3 seconds to arm and trigger when an enemy comes close, dealing Magic Damage and immobilizing them for 2 seconds.

name: Negate Magic
base_effect: Create a globe of magic suppression for 12 seconds, stunning enemies and dispelling enemy placed effects. Enemy players within the globe are silenced and cannot cast abilities.

name: Suppression Field
base_effect: Create a globe of magic suppression for 12 seconds, stunning enemies and dispelling enemy placed effects. Enemy players within the globe are silenced and cannot cast abilities. Also deals Magic Damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies in the area.
rank_progression: Duration and damage increase per rank

name: Absorption Field
base_effect: Create a globe of magic suppression for 12 seconds, stunning enemies and dispelling enemy placed effects. Enemy players within the globe are silenced and cannot cast abilities. Also heals you and allies within the area every 0.5 seconds.
rank_progression: Duration and healing increase per rank

name: Unholy Knowledge
base_effect: Reduces the Magicka and Stamina cost of all abilities by 3% per Dark Magic ability slotted.

name: Blood Magic
base_effect: Hitting an enemy with a Dark Magic ability heals you for 500 Health. This effect can occur once every 0.5 seconds.

name: Persistence
base_effect: Increases the duration of Dark Magic abilities by 10%.

name: Exploitation
base_effect: Increases your Spell and Weapon Critical rating against enemies who are afflicted with a Dark Magic effect by 657.

name: Unstable Familiar
base_effect: Summon a Daedric familiar to attack enemies for you. The familiar's attacks deal Shock Damage. Once summoned, you can activate the familiar's special ability to pulse area damage for 3 seconds.

name: Unstable Clannfear
base_effect: Summon a Daedric Clannfear to attack enemies for you. The clannfear's headbutt attacks deal Physical Damage and stun enemies. Once summoned, you can activate the clannfear's special ability to heal you and the clannfear.
rank_progression: Damage and healing increase per rank

name: Volatile Familiar
base_effect: Summon a Daedric familiar to attack enemies for you. The familiar's attacks deal Shock Damage. Once summoned, you can activate the familiar's special ability to deal Shock Damage to enemies near it every 2 seconds for 8 seconds.

name: Daedric Curse
base_effect: Curse an enemy with a destructive rune for 6 seconds. When the curse ends, the rune explodes, dealing Magic Damage to the target and nearby enemies.

name: Daedric Prey
base_effect: Curse an enemy with a destructive rune for 6 seconds. When the curse ends, the rune explodes, dealing Magic Damage to the target and nearby enemies. While the rune is active, your pets deal 55% more damage to the cursed target.

name: Haunting Curse
base_effect: Curse an enemy with a destructive rune for 8.5 seconds. When the curse ends, the rune explodes, dealing Magic Damage to the target and nearby enemies. The curse then returns to the target, exploding again after 3.5 seconds.

name: Summon Winged Twilight
base_effect: Summon a Winged Twilight to attack enemies for you. The twilight's attacks deal Shock Damage. Once summoned, you can activate the twilight's special ability to restore Magicka to you.
rank_progression: Damage and Magicka restoration increase per rank

name: Twilight Tormentor
base_effect: Summon a Winged Twilight to attack enemies for you. The twilight's attacks deal Shock Damage. While the twilight is active, you deal 8% more damage to enemies with 50% or more Health. Once summoned, you can activate the twilight's special ability to enrage it, causing it to deal 55% more damage for 10 seconds.

name: Twilight Matriarch
base_effect: Summon a Winged Twilight to attack enemies for you. The twilight's attacks deal Shock Damage. Once summoned, you can activate the twilight's special ability to heal you and up to 2 nearby allies.
rank_progression: Damage and healing increase per rank

name: Bound Armor
base_effect: Summon Daedric armor to protect yourself. While slotted on your current bar, increases your Block Mitigation by 40% and your Max Magicka by 8%.

name: Bound Armaments
base_effect: Summon Daedric armor to protect yourself. While slotted on your current bar, increases your Block Mitigation by 40% and your Max Stamina by 8%. Activating the ability causes you to launch Bound Armaments at an enemy, dealing Physical Damage. Generates a stack of Bound Armaments each time you deal damage with a Light Attack, up to 4 stacks. Bound Armaments deals 33% more damage per stack.

name: Bound Aegis
base_effect: Summon Daedric armor to protect yourself. While slotted on your current bar, increases your Block Mitigation by 40% and your Max Magicka by 8%. Also grants Minor Resolve, increasing your Physical and Spell Resistance by 2974 while on your current bar.

name: Conjured Ward
base_effect: Conjure globes of Daedric energy for protection for 6 seconds. The globes absorb damage equal to 50% of your Max Magicka plus an additional amount. This portion of the shield is also applied to your pets within 28 meters.

name: Hardened Ward
base_effect: Conjure globes of Daedric energy for protection for 6 seconds. The globes absorb damage equal to 66% of your Max Magicka plus an additional amount. This portion of the shield is also applied to your pets within 28 meters.

name: Empowered Ward
base_effect: Conjure globes of Daedric energy for protection for 6 seconds. The globes absorb damage equal to 50% of your Max Magicka plus an additional amount. This portion of the shield is also applied to your pets within 28 meters. Also grants Minor Intellect to you and nearby allies, increasing Magicka Recovery by 15%.

name: Summon Storm Atronach
base_effect: Summon a storm atronach at the target location for 18 seconds. When summoned, the atronach deals Shock Damage to enemies in the area and stuns them for 3 seconds. The atronach's attacks deal Shock Damage.

name: Greater Storm Atronach
base_effect: Summon a storm atronach at the target location for 23 seconds. When summoned, the atronach deals Shock Damage to enemies in the area and stuns them for 3 seconds. The atronach's attacks deal Shock Damage. The atronach has increased size and deals 15% more damage.

name: Charged Atronach
base_effect: Summon a storm atronach at the target location for 18 seconds. When summoned, the atronach deals Shock Damage to enemies in the area and stuns them for 3 seconds. The atronach's attacks deal Shock Damage. The atronach can be activated to cast an additional Shock Damage attack against nearby enemies.

name: Rebate
base_effect: When one of your summoned Daedric pets is killed or unsummoned, you restore 225 Magicka.

name: Power Stone
base_effect: Reduces the cost of your Ultimate abilities by 5%.

name: Daedric Protection
base_effect: Increases your Health Recovery by 100 for each Daedric Summoning ability slotted.
rank_progression: Health Recovery per ability per rank: 100/200

name: Expert Summoner
base_effect: Increases the Max Health of your summoned pets by 10%.
rank_progression: Pet Max Health increase per rank: 10%/20%

name: Mages' Fury
base_effect: Call down lightning to strike an enemy, dealing Shock Damage. If the enemy falls to or below 20% Health within 4 seconds of being struck, an explosion deals additional Shock Damage to them and nearby enemies.

name: Mages' Wrath
base_effect: Call down lightning to strike an enemy, dealing Shock Damage. If the enemy falls to or below 20% Health within 4 seconds of being struck, an explosion deals additional Shock Damage to them and nearby enemies. Explosion damage is increased by 20%.

name: Endless Fury
base_effect: Call down lightning to strike an enemy, dealing Shock Damage. If the enemy falls to or below 20% Health within 4 seconds of being struck, an explosion deals additional Shock Damage to them and nearby enemies. When the explosion kills an enemy, you restore 200 Magicka.

name: Lightning Form
base_effect: Assume a form of pure lightning for 15 seconds, granting Major Resolve, increasing your Physical and Spell Resistance by 5948. Nearby enemies take Shock Damage every 1 second.

name: Boundless Storm
base_effect: Assume a form of pure lightning for 20 seconds, granting Major Resolve, increasing your Physical and Spell Resistance by 5948. While active, also grants Major Expedition, increasing your Movement Speed by 30%. Nearby enemies take Shock Damage every 1 second.

name: Hurricane
base_effect: Assume a form of pure lightning for 15 seconds, granting Major Resolve, increasing your Physical and Spell Resistance by 5948. Nearby enemies take Physical Damage every 1 second. Each tick increases the radius by 1 meter and the damage by 5%, up to 6 times.

name: Lightning Splash
base_effect: Create a nexus of storm energy at the target location for 10 seconds, dealing Shock Damage to enemies in the area every 1 second.

name: Liquid Lightning
base_effect: Create a nexus of storm energy at the target location for 12 seconds, dealing Shock Damage to enemies in the area every 1 second. Duration increased.

name: Lightning Flood
base_effect: Create a nexus of storm energy at the target location for 10 seconds, dealing Shock Damage to enemies in the area every 1 second. Increased radius.

name: Surge
base_effect: Summon lightning to gain Major Brutality and Sorcery for 33 seconds, increasing your Weapon and Spell Damage by 20%.

name: Power Surge
base_effect: Summon lightning to gain Major Brutality and Sorcery for 33 seconds, increasing your Weapon and Spell Damage by 20%. While active, dealing damage heals you for 600 Health. This effect can occur every 0.3 seconds.

name: Critical Surge
base_effect: Summon lightning to gain Major Brutality and Sorcery for 33 seconds, increasing your Weapon and Spell Damage by 20%. While active, dealing Critical Damage heals you for 3300 Health. This effect can occur every 1 second.

name: Bolt Escape
base_effect: Transform yourself into pure energy and flash forward 15 meters, stunning enemies in your wake for 2 seconds. Casting again within 4 seconds costs 33% more Magicka.

name: Streak
base_effect: Transform yourself into pure energy and flash forward 20 meters, stunning enemies in your wake for 2 seconds and dealing Shock Damage. Casting again within 4 seconds costs 33% more Magicka.
rank_progression: Damage and stun duration increase per rank

name: Ball of Lightning
base_effect: Transform yourself into pure energy and flash forward 15 meters, stunning enemies in your wake for 2 seconds. You leave behind a ball of lightning that absorbs projectiles for 2 seconds. Casting again within 4 seconds costs 33% more Magicka.
rank_progression: Stun duration and absorb duration increase per rank

name: Overload
base_effect: Charge your fists with the power of the storm, replacing your Light and Heavy Attacks with lightning that deals Shock Damage. Heavy Attacks damage all enemies in front of you. Each attack consumes 15 Ultimate. Light Attack damage also applies to an additional nearby enemy.

name: Energy Overload
base_effect: Charge your fists with the power of the storm, replacing your Light and Heavy Attacks with lightning that deals Shock Damage. Heavy Attacks damage all enemies in front of you. Each attack consumes 15 Ultimate. Light Attack damage also applies to an additional nearby enemy. Heavy Attacks restore 480 Magicka and Stamina per enemy hit.

name: Power Overload
base_effect: Charge your fists with the power of the storm, replacing your Light and Heavy Attacks with lightning that deals Shock Damage. Heavy Attacks damage all enemies in front of you. Each attack consumes 15 Ultimate. Light Attack damage also applies to 2 additional nearby enemies. Damage increased by 15%.

name: Capacitor
base_effect: Increases your Magicka Recovery by 5% for each Storm Calling ability slotted.
rank_progression: Recovery increase per ability per rank: 5%/10%

name: Energized
base_effect: Increases the damage of your Shock and Physical abilities by 3%.

name: Amplitude
base_effect: Increases your damage done to enemies below 50% Health by 1% for each Storm Calling ability slotted.
rank_progression: Damage increase per ability per rank: 1%/2%

name: Expert Mage
base_effect: Increases your damage done with Heavy Attacks by 2%.
